gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc.scanner

Class ProjectScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.autodoc.scanner.ProjectScanner

  • public class ProjectScanner
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to get lists of files from jpf registered projects.
    Author:
    Carlos Uribe

      • scanAll

        public ScanData scanAll(TargetScanner.ScanType type)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        FileNotLoadedException,
                        ClassFileException
        Traverse all jpf projects registered in site.properties and get a filtered list of its files.
        Parameters:
        type - Scan type member of Scanner.ScanType enumeration. For more info about options check Returns:
        a list of files in all projects specified by type.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        FileNotLoadedException
        ClassFileException
